ack.p: R.P.S. wishes to thank K. Craft, G. Proper and J. Proper for their help conducting annual surveys, and the Lake County Forest Preserve District for permission to collect the data on Cypripedium species for use in this research. We also thank two anonymous referees for critiques on previous versions of this manuscript.
